Landing.featKitchenDesc: Scan receipts, track stock and create shopping lists.

Landing.aboutDesc: FamilyCore is designed to simplify the complex daily lives of modern families. Our goal is to strengthen family communication and facilitate organization using technology. Data privacy and user experience come first for us.
Landing.pricingDesc: FamilyCore is developed to make families' lives easier. All features are free to use. To cover server and maintenance costs, small non-intrusive ads might be shown within the app.
Landing.featVaultDesc: Store your passwords and private files encrypted with AES-256 military standard.
Landing.footerDevelopedBy: Coded with love by Sevgin SERBEST.
Landing.mobileDesc: We are carrying the FamilyCore experience to your pocket. Our iOS and Android apps are under development. Stay tuned!
